item.title: Raichur: Three boys missing from same village in Lingasugur taluk
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: Three boys missing from same village in Lingasugur taluk
Vartha Bharati | 11-06-2025 | 13:49:00 IST
Raichur: Three minor boys from the same village in Lingasugur taluk of Raichur district have gone missing after they left home and failed to return, according to local police.
The missing boys have been identified as Manjunath Parasappa Byagi (14), Rohit Gaddeppa Bhajantri (14), and Prajwal Gaddeppa (16), all residents of Karadkal village. The boys reportedly left their homes aroun...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi
